trans-unit.source: Create a new StorSimple Manager service
trans-unit.target: Create a new StorSimple Manager service

trans-unit.source: Describes how to create a new instance of the StorSimple Manager service using the Azure Government Portal.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to create a new instance of the StorSimple Manager service using the Azure Government Portal.

trans-unit.source: Use your Microsoft account credentials to log on to the <linkText>Microsoft Azure Government Portal</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Use your Microsoft account credentials to log on to the <linkText>Microsoft Azure Government Portal</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: In the Government Portal, click New > Data Services > StorSimple Manager > Quick Create.
trans-unit.target: In the Government Portal, click New > Data Services > StorSimple Manager > Quick Create.

trans-unit.source: In the form that is displayed, do the following:
trans-unit.target: In the form that is displayed, do the following:

trans-unit.source: Supply a unique Name for your service.
trans-unit.target: Supply a unique Name for your service.

trans-unit.source: This is a friendly name that can be used to identify the service.
trans-unit.target: This is a friendly name that can be used to identify the service.

trans-unit.source: The name can have between 2 and 50 characters that can be letters, numbers, and hyphens.
trans-unit.target: The name can have between 2 and 50 characters that can be letters, numbers, and hyphens.

trans-unit.source: The name must start and end with a letter or a number.
trans-unit.target: The name must start and end with a letter or a number.

trans-unit.source: Supply a Location for your service.
trans-unit.target: Supply a Location for your service.

trans-unit.source: Location refers to the geographical region where you want to deploy your device.
trans-unit.target: Location refers to the geographical region where you want to deploy your device.

trans-unit.source: Select US Govt Iowa or US Govt Virgina.
trans-unit.target: Select US Govt Iowa or US Govt Virgina.

trans-unit.source: Choose a Subscription from the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: Choose a Subscription from the drop-down list.

trans-unit.source: The subscription is linked to your billing account.
trans-unit.target: The subscription is linked to your billing account.

trans-unit.source: This field is not present if you have only one subscription.
trans-unit.target: This field is not present if you have only one subscription.

trans-unit.source: Select Create a new storage account to automatically create a storage account with the service.
trans-unit.target: Select Create a new storage account to automatically create a storage account with the service.

trans-unit.source: This storage account will have a special name such as "storsimplebwv8c6dcnf."
trans-unit.target: This storage account will have a special name such as "storsimplebwv8c6dcnf."

trans-unit.source: Click Create StorSimple Manager to create the service.
trans-unit.target: Click Create StorSimple Manager to create the service.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>create a service</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>create a service</linkText>

trans-unit.source: You will be directed to the Service landing page.
trans-unit.target: You will be directed to the Service landing page.

trans-unit.source: The service creation will take a few minutes.
trans-unit.target: The service creation will take a few minutes.

trans-unit.source: After the service is successfully created, you will be notified appropriately and the status of the service will change to Active.
trans-unit.target: After the service is successfully created, you will be notified appropriately and the status of the service will change to Active.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>service creation</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>service creation</linkText>
